name: Iron Golem
immunities: fire, poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Fire Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the golem is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golem makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The golem exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (l0d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
